Hi, my name is Teja Reddy. I’m a student studying computer science and cybersecurity, currently living in Newark, Delaware.

I'm always open to new challenges and problems. If you think you have something I might be interested in, get in touch.

Recent Projects

Markovian Tweets

Generates a random tweet of 280 characters from a huge text file.

Gee-Mail

A secure asynchronous (same-machine) message platform.

Command Line Minesweeper

A minesweeper game that is played on the terminal.

Asynchronous TCP Segment Exchanger

A networking program where the server and client exchange TCP messages of different sizes.

Server/Client Secret Message Exchanger

A networking application which implements both TCP and UDP to exchange secret messages between the server and client in a specified port range.

Data Encryption in IoT using modified Public Key Infrastructure (PKI)

Enabling security in an IoT network using select features of a PKI. The model was simulated using network simulator 3 and the security aspects were checked with wireshark.
